definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Polyesters are less brittle than epoxies, but not as flexible or tough as urethanes.
sentences.chinese: 聚酯沒有環氧樹脂發脆，但也沒有聚氨酯的堅韌性。

sentences.english: The results show that B-value can objectively 'measure the degree of paperbrittleness.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，B值較客觀地反映了紙質發脆的程度。

sentences.english: Brittle nails are indicative of calcium deficiency.
Extended use of these products can lead to split ends and brittle hair.
sentences.chinese: 過分的使用這些產品會導致頭髮分岔和發脆。
